ygData.subject: RE: Re: Optional locations
ygData.msgSnippet: Not to get everyone overly confused, but the pictures are from an EQ emulator program where you could tweak and/or modify various things in a stand alone
ygData.messageBody:
Not to get everyone overly confused, but the pictures are from an EQ
emulator program where you could tweak and/or modify various things in a
stand alone version of EQ. You could not make or do anything like this 100
level character on the real EQ servers, so this person just made a god
character and fooled around with the program.

Of note, though, are the pictures of a Gun and a Flying machine; which means
that, at least as far as Code goes, the items are coded. The question is:
are these items possible to make on the Live servers? Just because the code
is made for a gun and flying machine and you can see it on the EQ Emulator,
it does not mean it is possible to make on the Live servers. BUT, I hope
they are possible...or will be soon.

Kilkin Cobblepot

Check out this screenshot from the defunct emuQ webpage.
After you pick up
your jaw from the floor, look at what he has in his range
and ammo slot.

http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/poorguy.jpg

That means that the graphics for the guns are at least in
the game =)

mmmmmmm... guns

Catbik Tinkerton AKA The Terminator
